# PED::SET_GROUP_FORMATION_SPACING

## Summary
Sets the spacing which the group formation is currently using

## Parameters
* **GROUP_INDEX** uniqueGroupID
* **FLOAT** spacing: Space between peds
* **FLOAT** adjustSpeedMinDist = -1: Distance from spacing position at which ped slows down (leave at -1.0 if not sure)
* **FLOAT** adjustSpeedMaxDist = -1: Distance from spacing position at which ped speeds up (leave at -1.0 if not sure)

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
It is only valid for one script to do this at a time!
